name: swapAPI
description: Access 1inch Classic Swap API (Pathfinder v6.1) for token swaps with wallet integration. This API provides cutting-edge discovery and routing algorithm that offers asset exchanges at the best rates on the market. IMPORTANT: You MUST provide the required parameters based on the endpoint you want to call. For getting a quote: use endpoint 'getQuote' with chain, src, dst, and amount. For getting swap data: use endpoint 'getSwap' with chain, src, dst, amount, from, origin, and slippage. For checking allowance: use endpoint 'getAllowance' with chain, tokenAddress, and walletAddress. EXAMPLES: Quote: {"endpoint": "getQuote", "chain": 1, "src": "0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee", "dst": "0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48", "amount": "1000000000000000000"}. Swap: {"endpoint": "getSwap", "chain": 1, "src": "0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee", "dst": "0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48", "amount": "1000000000000000000", "from": "0x52bc44d5378309ee2abf1539bf71de1b7d7be3b5", "origin": "0x52bc44d5378309ee2abf1539bf71de1b7d7be3b5", "slippage": 1}. Allowance: {"endpoint": "getAllowance", "chain": 1, "tokenAddress": "0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48", "walletAddress": "0x52bc44d5378309ee2abf1539bf71de1b7d7be3b5"}.

endpoint.description: REQUIRED: The Swap API endpoint to call. Use 'getQuote' to find the best quote for a swap, 'getSwap' to generate swap calldata, 'getSpender' to get the 1inch router address, 'getApproveTransaction' to generate approve calldata, 'getAllowance' to check token allowance, 'getLiquiditySources' to get available protocols, 'getTokens' to get available tokens, 'executeSwap' to execute a swap with wallet, 'executeApprove' to execute an approval with wallet.

chain.description: REQUIRED: Chain ID for the network. Example: 1 for Ethereum mainnet, 137 for Polygon, 42161 for Arbitrum, etc.

src.description: Source token address (REQUIRED for getQuote, getSwap, executeSwap). Example: '0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee' for ETH, '0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48' for USDC

dst.description: Destination token address (REQUIRED for getQuote, getSwap, executeSwap). Example: '0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48' for USDC, '0xeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee' for ETH

amount.description: Amount to swap in wei/smallest unit (REQUIRED for getQuote, getSwap, executeSwap, executeApprove). Example: '1000000000000000000' for 1 ETH, '1000000' for 1 USDC (6 decimals)

from.description: Address that calls the 1inch contract (REQUIRED for getSwap). Example: '0x52bc44d5378309ee2abf1539bf71de1b7d7be3b5'

origin.description: EOA address that initiates the transaction (REQUIRED for getSwap). Example: '0x52bc44d5378309ee2abf1539bf71de1b7d7be3b5'

slippage.description: Slippage tolerance in percentage (REQUIRED for getSwap, executeSwap). Example: 1 for 1% slippage

walletAddress.description: Wallet address (REQUIRED for getAllowance, executeSwap, executeApprove). Example: '0x52bc44d5378309ee2abf1539bf71de1b7d7be3b5'

privateKey.description: Private key for wallet operations (REQUIRED for executeSwap, executeApprove). Example: '0x...'

tokenAddress.description: Token address for approval operations (REQUIRED for getApproveTransaction, getAllowance, executeApprove). Example: '0xa0b86991c6218b36c1d19d4a2e9eb0ce3606eb48'

protocols.description: Specify liquidity protocols to use (optional). Example: 'WETH,CURVE,BALANCER'

fee.description: Partner fee percentage (optional). Example: 1.5 for 1.5% fee

gasPrice.description: Gas price in wei (optional). Example: '12500000000' for 12.5 GWEI

parts.description: Maximum number of parts each main route part can be split into (optional). Example: 20

mainRouteParts.description: Maximum number of main route parts (optional). Example: 20

gasLimit.description: Maximum amount of gas for a swap (optional). Example: 11500000

includeTokensInfo.description: Include token info in response (optional). Example: true

includeProtocols.description: Include protocols used in response (optional). Example: true

includeGas.description: Include gas estimation in response (optional). Example: true

receiver.description: Recipient address for purchased tokens (optional). Example: '0x52bc44d5378309ee2abf1539bf71de1b7d7be3b5'

allowPartialFill.description: Allow partial fill of the route (optional). Example: true

compatibility.description: Enable compatibility mode for FoT tokens (optional). Example: false

usePermit2.description: Use Permit2 for approval (optional). Example: false
